website_summaries.verdict: The AKG Y50 headphones bring some serious thunder for just $100 without compromising high frequency presence and clarity.
pros: Powerful audio performance with intense, deep bass response and well-defined, crisp high-mids and highs
Inline remote control and microphone on a detachable cable
cons: Large logo on earcups not for everyone
Not for purists seeking flat response-style headphones

customer_reviews.title: They also suffer from poor design since
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a year and a quarter and the "on off" button has mostly stopped working now. They also suffer from poor design since, when folded, the opposite headphone nearly touches the button. A real shame as I love the sound quality... but they need a redesign. I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Had a defective unit
customer_reviews.text: I heard many great reviews of these headphones, and for this price, I definetely couldn’t have found a better deal. Upon receiving this product, I was impressed with the build quality, compared to the cheaper plasticy build on most Beats products. However when it came to pairing these with my iPhone, the headphones would not turn on. And after many attempts to pair them, the left earpad fell off and would not stick back on. I do not want to dismiss this as the products fault as I read many positive reviews here on Amazon and would seem as this was a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: David Ding

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for classical music.
customer_reviews.text: Having read glowing reviews of these I bought a pair. However, for classical music I would look elsewhere. They have an unnatural upper bass output which is wearing. Obviously the designers don't go to live concerts. Whether Bluetooth or directly conneced makes no difference. They are probably fine for pop, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BearofChorley

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for battery life...well done Amazon...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the b*&$^x! Bin the in-ear rubbish, slow down...yes slow down...stop rushing everywhere as all of us human sheep knobheads have evolved in the last few years...take a deep breath. Pop on your music of choice and ENJOY. ENJOY the only true wonder of the world...music. Take a slow stroll with these on and you will forget anything and everything and be with the music. Slow down and ENJOY
customer_reviews.author: Flueric

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, superb sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased last week and inseparable since then. The product has a premium feel and the sound quality is superb. Wireless sound quality is awesome and with wire the sound quality is good but that is fine as its wireless :). I was confused between Audio Technica ATH-AR3 and Bose on ear wireless but I am glad I chose them. I have a wired Bose on-ear and I found the AKG to be much better in terms of depth and Base. Really happy with these and would recommend these
customer_reviews.author: SHAKUN NAG

customer_reviews.title: Fallen apart in less than a year :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partner for his birthday 10.5 months ago and the cable has detached from the headphone itself. After spending £100 on this I would have expected better. They were used probably a couple of hours a week and a few long haul flights but not really a great deal when you see some people wearing headphones for hours each day. I have yet to hear back from the supplier regarding guarantee and hope this will be repaired but even if they are based on this experience I would not buy this make again.
customer_reviews.author: T. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality - now had them 2.5 years and I haven’t been careful with them, yet they still look and function as new. Nearly all my headphones are AKG apart from my Hifiman 520s - the simple reason being that AKG give the best sound quality by far, and these BT phones are no exception. Very good bass extension, excellent midrange and clear top end without being harsh. I can wear these for prolonged periods without any fatigue and as the cups are so soft they remain comfortable (although they do tend to warm your ears in warmer weather due to the amount of cushioning). No reason to choose any other BT on ear headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J. J. Green

customer_reviews.title: One Very Satisfied Audiophile
customer_reviews.text: I'm the fussiest when it comes to headphones so I had expected to pay a lot more than £100 for a decent Bluetooth set. I'm so glad I trusted the reviews on here and took a gamble with these. They sound phenomenal and the difference between wired and wireless audio quality is almost indiscernible. AKG - thanks for delivering everything I've been looking for at half the price I expected to pay! :D
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent improvement over previous AKG foldable model
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my old AKG headphone K-450 (which survived 7 years of regular usage) new one is bigger. Bigger drive gives better bass and quite detailed soundstage. Not quite Hi End experience - but for the fraction if the cost (reasonable mid range price) and portability option should be considered as one of the best foldable headphone on the market (this been noted by some audiophile magazines and I do believe those reviews been honest). Detachable cable is not locked in as in K450 (should be good for survivability of the cable). On the negative side - the headphones comes with neoprene carrying poach, the old K450 had carrying custom case (which is much safe way to carry headphones around).
customer_reviews.author: Alexey_R

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice. Both fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones because of all the great things I'd read online. It was all true as well. Great audio quality, and long lasting battery. However, the build quality is atrocious. In general they seem okay. But on one occasion, I took them out of the carry pouch, and one of the cups was dangling by a cable. I attempted to re-connect it, but it wasn't possible. Amazon were great and immediately had it replaced, only for it to happen again 3 months later. I definitely won't be buying a pair of these again, which I'm quite sad about.
customer_reviews.author: eergtrhngbfvseweghtg

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good for the money. £50-60 is a difficult price range; a fair bit more than 'disposable' ear pods, but will you get good sound and build quality for the money? From experience, these are more than 1\2 as good sound wise as a pair of Philips Fidelio M1s, which cost twice as much. Plus, whilst the Philips felt robust, the earpad glue came undone after a few months, whereas these have been used quite a bit in the past year and are as good as new. Not going to set the hearts of audiophiles a'flutter, but a signifcant step-up from stock mobile phone headphones and at £50, an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky P

customer_reviews.title: Badly designed power button...
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, they're actually good headphones although they are enormous. But, they're poorly designed. Unlike most headphones you just have to touch the power button for it to turn on. This isn't particularly an issue if you're wearing them but if you've got them stashed away in your backpack and you're on a call using your wired headset they'll take priority on an iPhone and you'll think you've been cut off. In the best case they connect and start draining your phones battery. I returned them after the second time that happened in the first week.
customer_reviews.author: I. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Frustration
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in Nov 2017. I did so, based on a previous pair I had, which I loved. Everything started ok, then after a couple of months, the wire started to loosen. Then last week the right earphone came away from the mount. As you can imagine I am very frustrated, I paid quite a lot of money for the headphones and expected them to last a fair while longer. I will say, when the headphones were working it was great, but it's not now after only 3 months
customer_reviews.author: T.C  "Freethinker"

customer_reviews.title: Well made product that looks good but not over impressed with the sound which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made product that looks good but not over impressed with the sound which is reflected by the price. Got these to replace my Sennheiser PMX60 neckband on ears but they don't sound anywhere near as good and are not as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Still

customer_reviews.title: I use these while jogging outside and the connection is always great. I keep my phone in a running pouch ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as i had a cheap set of bluetooh headphones that skipped as i jogged. I use these while jogging outside and the connection is always great. I keep my phone in a running pouch around my waist and sound quality and connection has always been great. They can get a little sweaty if you use them for a long time but i do have them on very tight to be fair. I would highly reccomend these to anyone in need of a good set of headphones. Having the 3.5m cable can be really handy too!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Andrew J. P. Curivan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeously Rich & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different brands of BT headphones. Bose, Beats etc. For the price these are wonderful!! The sound is gorgeously rich and very comfortable to wear. I wish I had these before wasting my money the others.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones and Amazon customer service
customer_reviews.text: Sound great and Bluetooth works perfectly with iPhone 7. I’ve had a pair for nearly 18 months but yesterday they wouldn’t charge after the battery ran down. I messaged Amazon and I have a brand new pair on the way arriving tomorrow free of charge. So a little disappointed that they failed but THANK YOU to Amazon for such phenomenal customer service. That certainly deserves 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leithgooner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of Bluetooth headphones as I do a lot of travelling and find wires and leads a bit of a pain. These AKG’s are an absolute joy to own. The sound quality is amazing with clarity in the vocals, rich bass and lovely treble. Nicely portable and easy to charge. They didn’t claim to be noise cancelling but so far they seem to be making a fair job of shutting out the world. My only small gripe would be that the carry bag supplied is not quite big enough to fit the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: harry hotspur

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for under £30 and they are in great condition. Excellent build quality. They also sound great using with Poweramp on Samsung mobile. Also if you use all the charge you can then use them as wired. Very impressed. If you are not to sure about buying them like i was you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: graham

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the negativity.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews on here and can suddenly smell cows. I've had mine for well over three years now, never once had any issues. People need to look after their stuff properly, that's all. I wear mine to work daily, I'm a support worker. The wires have been yanked and grabbed at, I've dropped them myself a couple of times, yet they're still going strong, and still sound fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tj.Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Such a Shame
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones about 6 months ago. I was so impressed with them. Battery life was great. SOunds quality was brilliant. Sadly last week the left earphone detached from the socket and I can no longer use them. I see a lot of people having the same issue with these breaking after a short amount of time. I will add I have used these every day since I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Alford

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of cans to use with my sony m4 phone and nexus tablet. I was a little worried if these devices had enough punch to use with the Y50s so took a punt and ordered the red ones having done a lot of research, and ended up choosing these over sennheiser and Philips retro cans. They are so nicely made as well as being light and are really comfortable, a true quality product! They sound flipping awesome even from my mobile. Nice bass to them and clear vocals. Very chuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: AKGY50 - too big for my head
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and the sound quality I get and the design that allows you to fold it up and how it's got a wire only on one side AND it's detachable. Absolutely like these details. Unfortunately, these are too big for my head :( I've never had this issue with any of the past models I used, but I can see how their designs are changing. I am not aware that one can choose sizes, as I never had to. I will be returning these as they fall off my head and can't even go for a walk with them ...
customer_reviews.author: Andreea R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound but
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. The sound is amazing. But there is one super irritating feature........ I tend to watch a lot of tv in bed in the dark and the light on the side of the headphones constantly flashes which is reflected on the screen. They also turn themselves back on if you fold them down and put them in the case. This needs to be remedied.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkly Star

customer_reviews.title: ... the sound quality from a blue tooth source is amazing. I would highly recommend these to anyone in ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these yesterday 2 days early and i must say the sound quality from a blue tooth source is amazing. I would highly recommend these to anyone in the market looking for new head phones. not sure on battery life yet and if you really do get 20 hours life, remains to be seen. Overall i'm very happy with this product. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good but despite looking after them well with use for 2 or 3 days a week with a couple of hours of wear a day one headphone has become unscrewed and won’t screw back in. This has now broken the wire and means the headphones are non-functional. If I pay £80+ for a pair of headphones that look ugly and aren’t especially noise cancelling, I expect them to last.
customer_reviews.author: Megannn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic clarity & sound for the price, and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality sound, fantastic clarity for the price. The headphone cups are really soft and the phones fit my head great. I don't get ear ache after long term use like I do with other headphones. Great battery life, they last for ever, although you need to be careful when folding them away as the on/off switch is placed in a daft area on the ear of the right headphone so that it can accidentally be knocked on by the other ear.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Mc

customer_reviews.title: Very Delicate
customer_reviews.text: I thought these headphones were amazing, comfy fit, great sound, easy connection to my smartphone, so why only a 2 star review? Well after using them for a total of about 3 hours, I went to pick them up from my desk and the one earphone just came off in my hand. I tried feeding the wire back in and pushing it back on the spigot but that solved nothing, it just fell off again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really love these - they are comfortable and sound fantastic. I am very picky about sound quality and these are absolutely amazing for the price. I bought them for listening to music but they have really proved useful for video calls now that I am working from home during the pandemic. I only use them at home so don’t travel or commute with them but they do seem very durable.
customer_reviews.author: "louisthe19th"

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding, however after a while these do hurt your ears. UPDATE- unfortunately the right ear has lost all sound meaning listening to music through these has become impossible
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I must say these AKGs are the best head phones Iv ever used. The sound quality is excellent and the build quality is excellent too. They fit on my ears just fine and they are very comfortable. I like that you can fold them and keep them in the AKG bag you get and I like that the cable can be detached from the head phones.
customer_reviews.author: AudiDoodi

customer_reviews.title: 20 hours battery, but incessantly starts warning you battery is low at only 30%
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. Good sound quality and portable. The hardwired cable is also a bonus. However, my main reason for buying them was the impressive 20-hour battery life, and they do last this long. But ... once the battery gets down to about 30%, they start beeping to warn you the battery is getting low. Every. Five. Minutes. 30% life is about 6 hours remaining, so I don't think a warning every 5 minutes is helpful. It's actually very distracting during a movie when there's enough battery left to watch two more! Maybe one beep at 10%, then another at 5%, then one each as the percentages drop.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Dead after a year ... no more AKG for me )))
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are not bad for the price . Bass heavy as expected , limited range . Battery life is VERY GOOD 10/10 on that . Comfy for the price . BUT they are DEAD already . It has been literally a year of around 2 hour per day (5 day a week) Sad really as they did not fall or anything , but I did not expect anything for the price. BUT I WILL WARN YOU that these are not durable at all .
customer_reviews.author: J.V

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, questionable design
customer_reviews.text: The sound from these is excellent with great isolation and good bass. They pair easily with different phones and transmitters. They also work well for calls. They look great but I find they hurt my ears after a while - I prefer in-ears or over-ears to on-ears. And the placement of the on/off switch is really stupidly designed - I have to keep a piece of plastic between the ear cups when the phones are folded to stop them switching themselves on.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Not working .
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection stopped working and I need to return and get my money back . This seems to be a common problem with these headphones . Please contact me to arrange return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A revelation
customer_reviews.text: I've been using in-ear headphones of so long that perhaps any on-ear phones might surprise me but these are unquestionably excellent. The rich quality of sound and the appearance of fine detail is excellent. With my in-ears adding a DAC to my iPhone didn't make a lot of difference. With these the difference is striking. I've only just started using them but they are already a revelation.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carver

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds, crappy build quality
customer_reviews.text: It is the most comfortable headphone I've ever owned, has no noise cancellation but does a pretty damn good job with sound isolation, where the end results are distinguishable. On the down side, the actual quality of materials is kinda bad, the hinge falls apart after roughly one to two years, this is the second headset with the same problem, I think I'm not gonna buy a third one and instead go with an another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Agócs András

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and comfortable Sounded ok
customer_reviews.text: Brought these due to price and a online 'best of 2015' recommendation. Pros: Nice looking and comfortable Sounded ok, but a lot less bass than my old beats (to be expected) Cons: Didn't like the swivel folding style and the carry bag doesn't close properly, headphones kept failing out in transit Sound failed to impress me or provide feeling to the music in most cases - missing too much bass for me Extending arm broke whilst trying to replace them in the loose bag again! Broke after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for large headed people that feel no pain
customer_reviews.text: These headphones manage to simultaneously squeeze the head and ears uncomfortably after a short period of time and feel like they could slip off at any second, even when adjusted to the smallest setting. I have a fairly big head, but can only imagine that these were made for a mythical beast with a huge cranium and a high pain threshold. Although you use them on phone calls, you have to use the handset to answer or terminate calls. First world problems, but annoying all the same. Sound quality is fine for me, connection rarely drops, and the battery life is great. Would like to return them, but they're not faulty. Just not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Iain Feaviour

customer_reviews.title: On par
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting better from these headphones. I give them 5 starts for build and comfort but I didn't find the sound great. I mainly want head phones to listen to speaking and so i was after detail. The base is really great on these head phones but I didn't use it for that. My friends low end Beats sound better to me than these. The wire to me seems to be very thin and i'm used to quality headphones having a thick wire so i'm not sure if that has something to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Eyermann

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price for an excellent pair of headphones. As good as a pair costing over £100 I borrowed recently. Seem well built and should last. I bought the pair with a lead. My experience with wireless had not been good. Too many dropouts when leaving a room for example and charging! Spoils the overall experience!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P

customer_reviews.title: all you can ask for
customer_reviews.text: one of the earmuffs fell off already, took quite a while to get it back on; don't know if this is going to be a recurring thing. sound quality is excellent and they're super comfy to wear. loyal customer of akg and these further prove why.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Wow !
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pair of mid range wireless Bluetooth headphones. WOW was blown away by the quality of the product and above all the sound quality. Excellent product !
customer_reviews.author: TSR300

customer_reviews.title: Long life good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sounds. Manages to reduce outside noise without blocking our direct conversation, making these ideal for office use. They don't have the most compact fold-up but I am happy to trade that for the solid build and material. They are, like any bluetooth, heavier than jack-only headphones. But the weight becomes a lot less noticeable after a few days use. The battery life lives up to claims making daily use reliable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my brother who loves these. Treble and bass ahd very well balanced and give an excellent audible experience. Would definitely get a pair myself having listened through these though I might look at the noise cancelling range as I have two children and need an excuse to have not heard them in the night... ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kyleisthebatman

customer_reviews.title: Do not work. Will not charge or turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Awe full and useless. Bought in January, very little use and now will not charge or turn on. Very expensive and do not work. Waste of money. I’ve asked for my money back. I expect a complete refund without delay. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: GC1

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I got these on offer from Amazon, they are very good headphones with a great sound. The build quality is good and the cups feel comfy on my ears. They do a good job of keeping external noise out and also keeping your sounds in so they would be fine on public transport. The head bar has very little padding & its this reason I have only given them 4 stars. The said I have used them in the Gym twice with no problems. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but needs better wire
customer_reviews.text: Detachable headphone wire is too flimsy and stopped working after a couple of years. AKG doesn't offer replacements so I had to get a crappy thick replacement wire that reduces the sound quality. Headphones are comfy and block out some background noise. They have a warm bassy sound, sort of like old vinyl records.
customer_reviews.author: Lyd

customer_reviews.title: Pukka Gear
customer_reviews.text: I have had the AKG 450 headphones for a few years now the but ear pads disintegrated and couldn't be replaced effectively. I looked up reviews and bought these, which are excellent for sound quality when using the higher quality sound sampling on an Apple iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Dai

customer_reviews.title: Impressive bluetooth headphones with low price.
customer_reviews.text: My first bluetooth headphones and certainly one of the best considering it's price and quality. It fits comfortably on your ears and the sound quality is impressive compared to other bluetooth headphones that seems to be overpriced when compared to this. It gets a bit hot after an hour or so use on your ears but I guess that's my personal preferences
customer_reviews.author: Valentinus J

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a year now. Very comfortable headphones although starts to hurt after a few hours (probably my fault for keeping them on so long) Great sound, apart from when I'm listening to 'voice memos' on the iphone for some reason. Music sounds great though with impressive amount of bass for bluetooth cans. Batteries last ages and it doesn't take long to charge either
customer_reviews.author: Tjwatson

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Spent ages deciding what headphones to buy that kept coming back to these the colour pattern may not be okay for Sam but I thought it was great technically they are very good sound quality was excellent very impressed with how well they work on a plane have no concerns are about recommending these to others and it's such a good price well worth it
customer_reviews.author: El Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Very good set of headphones. Good sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great for the price. They have good sound, but may need amplification due to the resistance of the headphones. After a while, they do hurt my head at the top. The foam doesn't do much and the headphone connector digs in and causes pain. I need to add something to this I think. Overall, a VERY good set of headphones for the price. I study Acoustics, so I know these headphones were good when I looked into them. I wasn't wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bassy
customer_reviews.text: Too bassy. On anything I listened to. I bought them for my wife on the back of your reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the customer service from Richer Sounds was great. Contacted me right away after I requested a ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these accidentally instead of the wireless version. I didn't actually get them out of the packaging as I returned them to Richer Sounds. I can't review the product, but the customer service from Richer Sounds was great. Contacted me right away after I requested a return and were quick in their response following. I have since purchased the wireless version of these and the sound quality is brilliant. From what I've read these and the wireless version are pretty much one in the same in terms of sound quality, so hopefully this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: Craig L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about 9 months now. They're comfortable for watching a film or two while on a plane. Being on ear they're not completely sour d proofing from outside noises but they don't leak a lot of sound. I use them occasionally while my wife is watching something on TV. The sound quality is good - better than my sons' beats solos IMO.
customer_reviews.author: M J Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks ou use the left side speaker stopped working. I don’t think it was the company fault . AKG is a reliable brand. I think the one I received was already reduced price and factory outlet one. Anyway the return process went smooth and I got my money back. Im buying a little bit more expensive Siny headphone instead.
customer_reviews.author: David Balogh

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones Yet.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for free with an Amazon promotion, pleasantly surprised at the quality, comfort and ease of use. Sound quality is better than anything else I have used, great for a trip and comfortably sit around your neck when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: G.J.A

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, terrible position of buttons
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sony pair and this. Bought this as an upgrade to it (tempted by the discount at the time). Should have left it as the sound quality wasn't that superior (if at all) to my current pair, and the button placements and functionality is simply not intuitive (compared with the Sony) when trying to go back, skip, fast forward tracks etc.
customer_reviews.author: Haznuser

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research as wanted some decent bluetooth on ear headphones. I initially wanted Bose as everyone does but reading the reviews decided to go with these. No regrets at all. They cost a lot less but the quality is high - most importantly they sound great, look good, not every other person on the tube has them and the battery lasts me for weeks (45 minute journey to and from work every day) strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The parent company is harman-kardon and easily blow my bower-wilkins p3s out the water. Very stylish (I have them in yellow-black) excellent sound quality, carry pouch and they seem sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza B

customer_reviews.title: Super good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones. I'm no specialist but I can definetly say that the experience of listening to music is a lot better since these. I was able to hear some sounds I was hearing only in a club before. Almost no noise leakage at all. I'm using them in my office and it's perfect. The only possible dissapointment is that the microphone can't for anything else except phone call from what I've seen. Still.. very good piece of equipment, sturdy feel and also good looks.
customer_reviews.author: Postolache Costin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! Things that are great: Sound quality Comfort on ears Build quality Loudness (I prefer my headphones to be able to go loud) Battery life Bluetooth range Not so great: They sometimes fall off my ears in the gym when laying flat Ears get warm after some use but not so much to stop me wearing them If these broke, I'd buy another pair immediately. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: First Bluetooth headset and I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones Pros: - Great sound quality - Bluetooth very reliable - Nice weight and fit - Very comfortable (worn all evening and hardly feel them) - Solid controls and quick device pairing - Premium feel Cons: - Concern over robustness (really minor gripe but not put them through transporting them around for work etc so have bought a hard shell case to protect them - will see how they fair after regular use on the commute to work) initial feeling is they could be a little delicate. Overall I love them and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly in perfect condition. These are certainly an excellent pair of headphones well worth the money I paid for them. They look great, are comfortable to wear and most importantly, sound great! They were very easy to set up, they connected easily with my iPhone in seconds. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: morris100

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: They do the job for a budget set of headphones. They are a little big so have padded out headband. All headsets seem to be a little on the big size for me so this may not be a problem for others
customer_reviews.author: Shazo42

customer_reviews.title: AKG quality headphones.
customer_reviews.text: A really good pair of headphones, the sound quality is excellent and I find them really comfortable to wear and are easily adjustable. Battery life seems good over the short time I’ve had them.
customer_reviews.author: David  Hurlston

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones well worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after having ear surgery as I felt the ear buds were a bit uncomfortable so wanted a good replacement. These are great very comfortable to wear for long periods and the sound quality is great in my book. I read several reviews before purchasing and felt it helped my choice of which headphones to purchase. I'm so please with these not only do they drown out noise whilst traveling they also keep my ears nice and toasty in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ryley

customer_reviews.title: poor quality Control.
customer_reviews.text: they look nice, but larger than i thought they would be, i had to return them due to the jack connection, each time it was touched or any movement that would move the jack the sound would be intermittently lost, WTH poor quality control, was going to use on the plane on hols, used old trusty cheap head phones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Get_Born

customer_reviews.title: nice low ends too
customer_reviews.text: Got these for work - I use them every day in a quiet office. I have them quite loud and after asking the people near me, they cannot hear a thing. Very clean sound. nice low ends too.
customer_reviews.author: RossH

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones. Cord is almost too long, but shouldn't complain. Feel good quality. Sound is about what I expected. I wasn't blown away, but for the cost, they are good value. Evenly balanced sound. I use these with my tablet and mobile. In terms of volume, I think it must depend heavily on the phone - my old phone struggled to get the volume that high, whilst my tablets and new phone are absolutely fine.
customer_reviews.author: fatboy

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality great.... but quite strong clamp force
customer_reviews.text: The sound from these was awesome but they had quite a lot of clamping force .... made it uncomfortable to listen to over long periods (2 hours+) compared to other headphones I've used.
customer_reviews.author: MeMyselfAndI

customer_reviews.title: They deliver excellent sound quality (including bass frequencies) with the freedom of ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these headphones. They deliver excellent sound quality (including bass frequencies) with the freedom of a wireless connection. Pairing with my 'phone and TV was a doddle. Noise cancelling is very effective. Long battery life too. The only niggle is that when the headphones are folded for storage the on/off button presses against the other side, which can turn the headphones back on again. But that is minor. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Davies

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They're not noise cancellation headphone's but the ear pads do a fantastic job of keeping out unwanted back ground noise. I am a big fan of the Y50's but I have fallen in love with these headphones straight away. The sound quality is just as good as the corded. Absolutely fantastic headphones for the money. A must buy, I can't recommend them enough, being a ex sound engineer they are too notch.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nelson

customer_reviews.title: shame akg are a super company
customer_reviews.text: headphones sound brilliant its just the headphones around peoples heads isn't big enough .so everyone gets so ears in a short time.akg should have known this if they had tried them like people who buy it.ive got other headphones that are bigger around my head and I never get sore ears.my head is normal sized. if akg are reading this is from everyone who will buy these headphones.brilliant sounding but uncomfortable to wear to uncomfortabnle,everyone will write this after trying them
customer_reviews.author: brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable and awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Using it since a year now and the headphones still have the same sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kaxil

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones. Very bass heavy sound, which I prefer. Blocks out the surrounding sound. Inline control easy to use. First AKG product I've bought. Would buy again. If you want a more in-depth review go to What Hifi? website.
customer_reviews.author: 😏

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones right up until the power button stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones right up until the power button stopped working, after which they became a pair of nice looking paperweights. The button intermittently started failing after a couple of months and gave up the ghost entirely this morning, six months after purchase. Which is a shame because otherwise they were really good: excellent range, good sound, comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: 2 sent - 2 would not switch on
customer_reviews.text: Amazon helpful - but could not get manufacturer to do a transfer call to me to see if they could get it working. Unhelpful manufacturer - wasted my time I buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Robb

customer_reviews.title: Battery fail
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these wireless headphones, but after less than 18 months the battery has failed and I can no longer charge them. This is just not good enough. *Amazon are sending me a replacement which is helpful, but I still think it's very poor that a £125 pair of headphones fails after less than 18 months use
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone
customer_reviews.text: Still working for me after 3 years. Sounds great, and I only have to charge it once a week because the battery lasts quite long. Bluetooth connectivity is great, can easily move around my flat without having to worry about disconnects.
customer_reviews.author: Summit

customer_reviews.title: Free Your Ears!
customer_reviews.text: Very good build quality & for the price & excellent sound. Bought to replace hi endish head phones who's ear pads had deteriorated I was sceptical at first but once on & worn for a while I can say I am impressed. So far no issues with drop off & the fact you can get up & walk around is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: K Armitstead

customer_reviews.title: these AKG Y50BT have excellent quality and would recommend them as a bluetooth headphone
customer_reviews.text: purchased these for my iPad as i already had aka wired head phones, these AKG Y50BT have excellent quality and would recommend them as a bluetooth headphone, bit heavy on the head and weighty so given 4* other wise i would give 5
customer_reviews.author: vics

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for modern music.
customer_reviews.text: My model needed to burn-in. When headphones arrived disappointed me so much, mids around 1kHz made me suffer, and I wanted to return them. After 10 hours of playing they started talking decently, mids decreased, warm and vibrant bass makes lot of fun, sound scene appears not as much as sometimes needed, but still fair enough. Vocals and distorted guitars highly exposed. Although headphones are quite heavy they are comfortable even for longer use, they have soft earpods.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Racis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: After reading a few reviews these were purchased for my husband. Very comfortable with a handy removable cable. They fold up neat into a great little storage bag. Ok the over ear headphones aren't everybody's thing but he is delighted to have alternative to in ear plugs. Looks wise these are really very nice prompting me to consider them but in white.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound from these babies.
customer_reviews.text: These cans sounds brilliant. I bought them for Christmas for my girlfriend and did a sound-off with my new Sennheiser HD 2.30i (similar price) and these win. The sound is more forward, less tinny, more relaxed and easy listening.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Caine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The microphone doesn't work, after 2 months stopped working. The answer /change track botton neither. ***Update I have to give 5 star coz they send me a new one in less than 24 hours. Amazing customer service. Hopefully is gonna last
customer_reviews.author: Erixfly

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these headphones. The sound quality is excellent, they are very comfortable, even with prolonged use, and the battery lasts for ages. Once you get use to them, the controls are easy to use. I particularly like the blue colour, even if they cost a little bit more than the black ones. For the price, nothing comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Lastboyscoutuk

customer_reviews.title: Simply not working
customer_reviews.text: No idea what were they thinking, sending me a not working pair of Y50? I tried turning them on, no response, decided should be put to charge. An hour later nothing, 2 still nothing, as if there is no battery. Tried them with the jack, they work, however the sound quality is a tragedy, sound cancellation is absent. I have ordered the same pair before as a gift, stunning quality, fell in love. Can't say the same with this pair
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: good headphones with easy bluetooth modified
customer_reviews.text: Ive got 3 pairs of akg headphones bein these k450 which the y50 sound a sound better through oit the range and k702's which are amazing probably best heasphones under £400 but large and open back so only really good indoors and nobody sat next to you.the y50s are more versatile and ive modified mine into bluetooth with a diSnix small bluetooth receiver with aptx so u get CD quality an a 2.5mm jack to 3.5 female small cable which i velco to side . doesn't look as good as y50bt but saves you £70 i can live with that.i cant give 5 stars because other headphones ive got sound better.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good looking headphones. Battery life appears to be very good. Would be great if you were given an audio status about battery life like my old pair of Sol Republic B/T cans. Sound is quite good with reasonable bass but could be louder at times. The fit for me is very comfortable so I can wear them for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Macaber

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality, didn't even last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This product initially pleased me with good audio quality for its price, however, these headphones barely lasted 5 months of use. I started using these in late August and I was careful to store them in a case when not in use. A few weeks ago, shortly after the 5 weeks anniversary of me purchasing these, one of the phones came off completely, later that day the other phone cut off and stopped working. Disappointing, I expected far better from a Richer Sounds sold product.
customer_reviews.author: Will Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Did compare well with my now broken Sony MDR1BT's for sound quality but because of the cup size not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a week. Charged but won't turn on again. When it did work the sound was passable because the ear cups weren't ab;e to fit over my ears and so rested on them meaning the sound was somewhat muted. Did compare well with my now broken Sony MDR1BT's for sound quality but because of the cup size not comfortable for extended wear.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf (Smiley) Yearwood

customer_reviews.title: Good set but wasn't blown away.
customer_reviews.text: After reading a wide range of reviews for these headphones it was an easy choice to pick these as other reviews have been very complementary. These are the most expensive set of earphones I have ever bought but I was slightly underwhelmed. They sounds like good headphones, nothing spectacular. In fact I actually think I prefer my cheap £20 set of in-ear headphones over these.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Thompson

customer_reviews.title: even on the smallest setting they feel lose over my ears and the weight of the bins make slipping easy. TWO
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound quality and well made. Clear treble and base. Only two little niggles... ONE: they seem to be made for giant heads, even on the smallest setting they feel lose over my ears and the weight of the bins make slipping easy. TWO: the location of the on/off button wasn't well thought out, the headphones fold up and a great space saving way how ever the phones touch in the close position right where the power button is and i've accidentally turned these headphones on numerous occasions. That said, I do love them for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: P Delahay

customer_reviews.title: These are very good sounding BT on-ear cans
customer_reviews.text: These are very good sounding BT on-ear cans... I recently bought the Cowin E7s, But the BT was so bad I had to return... Sooo glad I did, these are twice the price but thrice the headphones... Clear tones all through the spectrum, and a fat bass too. Highly recommend.. I am a gardener so these have now become a good friend and daily partner...
customer_reviews.author: The Consumer..!!!

customer_reviews.title: The last of the wired commuter headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the last wired headphones I'll buy and boy they are quite brilliant for the price. They are a bit tight on my ears with glasses, but other than that superb. Sound quality is great, build quality seems very good. Love the detachable cable and they even bundle in a nice 1/4" jack adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Dobsy

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for £50!
customer_reviews.text: NOTE - this is a review of the wired Y50, NOT the Bluetooth versions. Amazon is again mixing them all together. Classy feel. Nice design. Decent size ear pads bigger than Y45s. Comfortable. Sound seems good so far. Not super loud so will see how copes with public spaces. For £50....feels like a bargain. Update - wore these on a long flight to watch movies. Very good. The slightly larger earcup size kept out a lot of noise. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound! Buttons very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound! Buttons very easy to use. The only thing that I don't like is when using the bluetooth, you always have the blue light blinking intermittently which calls a bit of peoples attention specially in the dark haha.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Look awesome and sound even better
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for the past 6 months or so. The sound is pretty awesome and they look great. The only downside i have found is that they are a little tight on my head. This can mean long stints listening to music can start to become a bit uncomfortable. That's the only fault I can find and may just be because i have a wide head?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: AKG Y50BTBLK Portable Foldable On-Ear Rechargeable Bluetooth Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Y50BT| Colour Name:BlackAKG Y50BT Portable Foldable On-Ear Rechargeable Bluetooth Headphones - Black.

BOX CONTAINS
AKG Y50BTBLK Portable Foldable On-Ear Rechargeable Bluetooth Headphones - Black
feature_bullets: Forget the wires and connect instantaneously to any Bluetooth enabled device
On-ear headphone with closed ear-cup design for reduced ambient noise
Comfortable fit with rugged and lightweight design
More than 20 hours battery life, the Y50BT also works with a by-pass cable
3D-axis folding mechanism and pouch for easy storage and safe transportation
The red diode that lights up when charging begins will go out again when charging is complete

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
